experience.title: Team Lead
experience.description: Guide : Professor Debashish Chakravarty- International winner, IROS Navigation and Manipulation Challenge, 2021.- Mars Rover Team Lead, guiding multiple subsystems to build a rover prototype for URC 2021 and 2022.- Developed the wheels, chassis and suspension system for the University Rover Challenge (URC) 2021 prototype as a part of the Mechatronics Team Member.- Developing LiDAR-based and stereocamera-based GPS-Denied Localisation Pipelines as a member of the SLAM Module.- Part of the controller testing team of the Indy Autonomous Challenge team of IIT Kharagpur.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.description: Research Domain : Learning-based path planningGuide : Professor Joydeep Biswas- Developed motion planning networks and informed sampling planners for local planning in cluttered environments. - Working on transformer based predictive path planning approaches for high speed navigation (F1Tenth) in cluttered scenarios.

experience.title: Summer Intern
